stem: Given question: When in a serious relationship understanding better requires what? and answer: effort, explain why in
no_more_50_words: When two people are in a romantic relationship (particularly a long-term one), they can often get complacient and comfortable, failing to put in the effort to communicate and understand one another.
100_to_150_words: Understanding a serious relationship better requires effort because relationships are complex. In order to understand each other’s feelings, needs, and perspectives, both parties must be willing to communicate and work together. It is important to take the time to listen to each other’s needs and feelings, without judgement. This requires effort on both sides, as it takes time and energy to listen to what the other person is saying and to work through disagreements. Additionally, both parties must be willing to compromise and to understand that there may not always be a “right” answer to everything. With effort, both parties can learn to better understand each other, build trust, and create a strong bond. Ultimately, effort is necessary to maintain a healthy and meaningful relationship.
